name: Booze Helper
description:
Fixes drinking sounds for ladies (no more old man groan).

Also returns glass flasks when the purified water is used in the brewing process.
changeNote: A new approach using only the ModController to place Buffy, then buffy does the erasure and re-assignment of the buffsystem and variables on a 2 second delay to work around this bug:  https://answers.unrealengine.com/questions/706505/view.html
author: Kharzette
